title: Leaver buster
body: i thought u removed my leaver buster for " give client restart rito says " after remake game cuz me . But u didnt , why ? Can u remove it riot ?

replies.body:
The /Remake system will mark any player that is inactive for 90 seconds or more within the first 3 minutes of the match. If anyone is marked, at 3:00 the remake goes up for a vote and if it passes, those who were marked as *inactive* will be given a loss penalty and can be penalized by a low-priority queue. We cannot modify or remove any penalties as a result of actions by this system.

Check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) on this system for complete info. Let me know if you have any questions.
